attributes.action: Hold a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs.
attributes.additional_details: Future generations of young people can feel safe and protected by the authorities within the borders of their own country.
attributes.background: The victims of these gangs have been let down by the establishment for the sake of diversity. This needs to to debated so it never happens again.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
